CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, September 23, 1961, pg. A12, reads: "Engaged - Mr. and Mrs. Earl V. Hord of Pittsburgh announced the engagement of their daughter, Marva Jo, to Eugene E. Harris, grandson of Mrs. Ruth Smith of Zaruba St. The lovely Marva Jo, a member of the Junior Leaguers, is a senior at Chatham College.  Her fiance is a senior at Penn State University.  A spring wedding is being planned."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Marva Hord, wearing dress monogrammed "M. J. H.", and seated on patterned sofa with bookcase in background
